title: Norman Reedus
summary: Norman Mark Reedus (born January 6, 1969) is an American actor best known for starring as Daryl Dixon in the AMC horror drama series The Walking Dead (2010–2022). He also starred as Murphy MacManus in the film The Boondock Saints (1999) and its sequel The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day (2009), Scud in Marvel's Blade II (2002), Marco in Deuces Wild (2002), and himself in his AMC TV show Ride with Norman Reedus (2016–2021). He has acted in numerous films and television series, and modeled for various fashion designers (including Prada in the 1990s). Reedus also provided motion capture and voice acting for the lead character Sam Porter in the video game Death Stranding (2019).
